questions.question: Which ion influx triggers neurotransmitter release at the synaptic cleft?
What is the role of acetylcholinesterase in synaptic transmission?
options: Breaks down acetylcholine in the synaptic cleft
Reuptakes acetylcholine into the presynaptic neuron

questions.question: Which of the following is an excitatory neurotransmitter in the central nervous system?
How does the parasympathetic nervous system primarily affect heart rate?
options: Increases heart rate via beta-1 adrenergic receptors
Decreases heart rate via muscarinic cholinergic receptors
Increases blood pressure via alpha-1 adrenergic receptors
Increases coronary vasodilation via nitric oxide release

questions.question: Which ion is primarily responsible for the repolarization phase of the action potential in neurons?
